content: fuck ice dishcloth by danna rachel because craftivism is real finished measurements 10 in x 8 in yarn knit picks dishie 100% cotton 190/100 g or ~75 yards of worsted weight cotton needles us 7 4 5mm circular or straight needle or size to obtain gauge gauge 16 sts and 28 row = 4 in in stockinette stitch notes the world is on fire the united states is marching toward authoritarianism and trump s personal murderous army looks more and more like hitler s slip_stitch so i am back again to angry-knit so if this tickles your angry bone i hope you will join me in declaring fuck ice with every rageful stitch normally i say happy knitting but today i say fight fascism i am not asking for money for this pattern but i am asking that you vote if you are eligible that you turn others out to vote that you march that you give money and/or time to your favorite justice organization that you shout that you stand up that you protect your neighbors and that you do all of it non-violently together we can defeat fascism directions cast on 45 sts pithy row 11 k11 p6 k3 p4 k3 p6 k12 row 1 -
